title: Gunning for the Title
description:
The FC crew discuss Arsenal's 3-0 win at Brentford and don't agree if Mikel Arteta's side can be considered title challengers. Real Madrid's derby win was marred by Atletico Madrid fans aiming racist abuse at Vinicius Junior. Plus, who's in more trouble: Juventus or Inter?

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Arsenal top of the Premier League table; Atletico Madrid aim abuse at Vinicius Junior; Juventus and Inter stumble in Italy
